title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 255.115 - Temperature derating factor (T) for steel pipe
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 255.115 - Temperature derating factor (T) for steel pipe

State Regulations
(a) The temperature derating factor to be
used in the design formula in section
255.105
is determined as follows: Gas Temp. in

Temperature
degrees
derating

Fahrenheit
(Celsius)
factor (T)
250 (121) or less....... 1.000
300 (149)....... 0.967
350 (177)....... 0.933
400 (204)....... 0.900
450 (232)....... 0.867
(b) For intermediate gas temperatures, the
derating factor is determined by interpolation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
255.115

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
